1916. Cowan, Mrs. John
Langbank.

There did you see us last Christmas? Yes, I did.

What was your favorite thing to do at Christmas? I liked to go skating.

Did you have any special traditions? We always had a big family dinner.

How often did you visit your grandparents? Every year.

Did you ever go on a trip? Yes, we went to Europe.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The food!

Did you bring back any souvenirs? Yes, I bought a scarf.

Did you ever go on a camping trip? No, we didn't have enough money.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The campfire!

Did you ever go on a road trip? Yes, we went to the beach.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The waves!

Did you ever go on a hike? Yes, we went to the mountains.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The view!

Did you ever go on a picnic? Yes, we went to the park.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The food!

Did you ever go on a concert? Yes, we went to see a band.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The music!

Did you ever go on a movie night? Yes, we went to see a movie.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The popcorn!

Did you ever go on a birthday party? Yes, we went to a birthday party.

What was your favorite part of the trip? The cake!
